data.name: Element Runner Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is a free demo for the game Element Runner!

Across land, water and clouds!

Element Runner is a fun, casual platformer where you can explore worlds filled with grass, water, fire, candy and electricity!

This free demo contains the first 16 levels of the game, taken from the first two worlds!



NOTE: The game is currently only available on Windows but we will have Mac and Linux versions available one day!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
